Salutations

I'm using Github Pages to blog about my projects, poetry and whatnot. Unfortunately, experience has told me it takes me just too much time to be able to write a proper post. So expect large periods of silence or even complete abandonment at any point of time.

Don't be confused by the simple layout. It's a feature.
